*div1 type="summary"* *p*Slow improvement of Texas. False reports published. Topographical conditions at mouth of Brazos River. Owns no slaves. Biographical.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Mouth of the Brasos river*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="12-12-1825">December 12 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Sister,*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr. Mothershead*/person_mentioned* from *location_mentioned*Missouri*/location_mentioned* starts *date_mentioned n="12-13-1825">tomorrow */date_mentioned*and has promised to deliver this to you as he goes through *location_mentioned*Mine á Burton*/location_mentioned*. I have nothing very material to write—having some surveying to attend to in this *location_mentioned*quarter */location_mentioned*I accompanied the *person_mentioned*surveyor */person_mentioned*and have just returned from a fishing and oystering trip, and think my health (which has not been very good) is improved—we procured a great abundance of fish, oysters and wild fowl and have had very fine weather*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*John Austin*/person_mentioned* have commenced building a *location_mentioned*Gin */location_mentioned**location_mentioned*a little below the head of tide water on this river, about 40 miles by water from this place*/location_mentioned*—he has commenced in the woods and intends to be a first rate *person_mentioned*farmer*/person_mentioned* we neither of us own any *person_mentioned*negros */person_mentioned*and have to depend on hireing*/p*
*p*The *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned* progresses very well, tho not very rapidly, I am very well satisfied that you have not removed here, the *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* is very new yet, and I think *person_mentioned*Mr Perry*/person_mentioned* can do better where he is for the present than he could do here—-we have but little commerce as yet—tho must have a great deal in a few years—*/p*
*p*The reports in the*location_mentioned* news papers */location_mentioned*relative to overflow, Sickness, etc, etc, etc, in this *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned* are all false—we have very abundant crops—*/p*
*p*I have just heard of *person_mentioned*Wm Perry*/person_mentioned*s murder—if his *person_mentioned*murderer */person_mentioned*comes within my reach he shall be secured and lodged in *location_mentioned*Nachitoches jail*/location_mentioned* — I am told that his name is *person_mentioned*Hill*/person_mentioned*, is it the same *person_mentioned*Hill*/person_mentioned* that worked for *person_mentioned*Bryan*/person_mentioned* and married one of the *person_mentioned*Doggits*/person_mentioned*? Send me a particular description of him and the *location_mentioned*news paper*/location_mentioned* that offers the reward and if he comes here I may be able to get some one to take him back to *location_mentioned*Potosi*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*I am daily expecting something from you and *person_mentioned*Mr. Perry*/person_mentioned* relative to the *location_mentioned*Mine a Burton Estate*/location_mentioned*—you must do the best you can, it will be many years before I can see *location_mentioned*Missouri*/location_mentioned*, or *location_mentioned*brother*/location_mentioned* either*/p*
*p*I am getting tired of Colonization affairs and hope before long to close my business and settle on a *location_mentioned*farm*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*Remember me to your *person_mentioned*Husband*/person_mentioned* and assure him that nothing would give me more real pleasure than to see him in this *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*as soon as his business will permit, he will find us in the *location_mentioned*woods*/location_mentioned*-—and poor The enterprise I undertook is better calculated to enrich those who come after me than to benefit myself—I have the labor to perform and the seed to sow, but my *person_mentioned*successors */person_mentioned*will reap the harvest—*/p*
*p*Give my respects to *person_mentioned*Saml Perry*/person_mentioned* and to *person_mentioned*John*/person_mentioned* and his *person_mentioned*wife*/person_mentioned* and my other *person_mentioned*acquaintances*/person_mentioned*— Your *person_mentioned*brother*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*N. B. I am very much fatigued and have a headache which must be my excuse for such a scrall as I now send you— What are the *person_mentioned*Jones*/person_mentioned* doing? where is *person_mentioned*Mrs. Henry Elliott*/person_mentioned*?— What has become of *person_mentioned*James Austins children*/person_mentioned*?— What is *person_mentioned*G. Hammond*/person_mentioned* doing? I received a letter from *person_mentioned*Arch. Austin*/person_mentioned* in *location_mentioned*New York*/location_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Henry*/person_mentioned* had gone to *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*—are *person_mentioned*Horaces children*/person_mentioned* doing well ? where is his *person_mentioned*wife*/person_mentioned*? etc etc*/p*
*p*This *location_mentioned*river*/location_mentioned* mouths into the *location_mentioned*wild ocean*/location_mentioned* without any *location_mentioned*bay*/location_mentioned*, and the breakers are roaring within Eighty yards of me—there is a good *location_mentioned*two story frame house*/location_mentioned* and some *location_mentioned*cabins */location_mentioned*here and there is at this time 8 feet water over the bar Salt water is produced here by digging 10 feet so strong that 5 gallons of it will make one of salt, and by digging 4 feet good fresh water is found in abundance,—Mosquitoes are troublesome at this time— I have discovered in my fishing trip that the *location_mentioned*west end of Galveston bay*/location_mentioned* comes *location_mentioned*within four miles of this place*/location_mentioned*, and *location_mentioned*within 200 yards of a deep tide water creek that empties into the Brasos*/location_mentioned*, so that 200 yards digging will open an *location_mentioned*inland water communication*/location_mentioned* with the *location_mentioned*Harbor of Galveston*/location_mentioned* where ships of 400 tons can enter with safety—I shall spend some time on the *location_mentioned*coast*/location_mentioned*—it is *location_mentioned*75 miles from here to where I live*/location_mentioned* at present tho I intend to remove about *location_mentioned*25 miles by water above here, 10 by land*/location_mentioned*—*/p* */div1*
